actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish and operate a ferry on Lake Franklin D. Roosevelt as part of the Columbia Basin project, Washington.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish and operate the Inchelium - Gifford Ferry on Lake Franklin D. Roosevelt as part of the Columbia Basin project, Washington. Authorizes appropriations to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish and operate a ferry on Lake Franklin D. Roosevelt as part of the Columbia Basin project, Washington.
